title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 142/90 of 19 January 1990 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1781/89 issuing a standing invitation to tender for the sale, for use within the Community, of vinous alcohol held by intervention agencies
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 142/90
of 19 January 1990
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1781/89 issuing a standing invitation to tender for the sale, for use within the Community, of vinous alcohol held by intervention agencies
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 1781/89 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 January 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 84, 27. 3. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 128, 11. 5. 1989, p. 31.
(3) OJ No L 346, 15. 12. 1988, p. 7.
(4) OJ No L 178, 24. 6. 1989, p. 1.
(5) See page 23 of this Official Journal.
(6) OJ No L 178, 24. 6. 1989, p. 10.
ANNEX
'ANNEX
